question: Mr V. Dhananjay Kumar passed away in Mangaluru, Karnataka in March 2019. Who was he?
option1: A former union minister from Karnataka
option2: A famous ISRO scientist from Karnataka
option3: A famous padmashri awardee actor from Karnataka
option4: A famous jnanpith awardee novelist from Karnataka
answer: A former union minister from Karnataka
explanation: V Dhananjay Kumar was a former Union and Cabinet minister of India and a former Member of Parliament from Mangaluru, Karnataka. He was a cabinet minister for Civil Aviation and Tourism in 1996, Union Minister of State for Finance from 1999 to 2000 and Union Minister of State for Textiles from 2000 to 2003.
